items.title: Is the US preparing to strike Iran?
items.description: Satellite images show a steady and significant build-up of US military forces in the region.

items.title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
items.description: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

items.title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
items.description: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

items.title: Man guilty of assault after Barron Trump reported attack to UK police
items.description: Donald Trump's son told officers he had seen the victim being beaten up during a video call in January 2025.

items.title: Europe must act urgently and stop outsourcing defence, says EU's Kallas
items.description: The EU foreign policy chief's remarks come days after Nato's secretary general said Europe needed the US for its defence.
